product_name: Merrell Encore Nova Shoes - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Comfortable and up for anything, the flexible Merrell Encore Nova Shoes offer slip-on ease, delivering comfort and support from the first step outside. Nubuck leather uppers provide water and stain resistance all season long. Breathable mesh linings treated with Aegis(R) Microbe Shield antimicrobial solution maintain foot comfort and keep odors away. Q-Form(TM) midsole alignment system provides women a precise anatomic fit for superb, tailored comfort. EVA midsoles with Air Cushion heel pods deliver cushioning comfort underfoot; molded nylon arch shanks add support and help control flex. Merrell Encore Nova Shoes sport nonmarking rubber outsoles for sure-footed traction. Closeout.
short_description: Comfortable and up for anything, the flexible Merrell Encore Nova Shoes offer slip-on ease, delivering comfort and support from the first step outside.
